getPSDEDQConditions.name: (CREATE_MAN) 等于(=) 用户上下文 srfpersonid

getPSDEDQConditions.condition:
exists(select 1 from discuss_post t2, discuss_topic t3 where t2.topic_id = t3.id 
 and t1.post_id = t2.id and t3.id = #{ctx.webcontext.discuss_topic})
getPSDEDQConditions.name: 当前话题下的回复
过去天数(CREATE_TIME) 小于等于(<=) 30

getPSDEDQConditions.condition: exists(select 1 from `discuss_post` t2, `member` t3 where t1.post_id = t2.id and t2.topic_id = t3.owner_id and t3.user_id = #{ctx.sessioncontext.srfpersonid})
getPSDEDQConditions.name: 当前登录用户已加入过的话题

getPSDEDQConditions.condition:
exists(select 1 from discuss_post t2, discuss_topic t3 where t2.topic_id = t3.id 
 and t1.post_id = t2.id and t3.id = #{ctx.webcontext.discuss_topic})
getPSDEDQConditions.name: 当前话题下的回复

getAllPSDEFDTColumns.name: COMMENT_NUM
getAllPSDEFDTColumns.queryCodeExp: (SELECT COUNT( com.ID ) AS comment_count FROM DISCUSS_REPLY reply LEFT JOIN `COMMENT` com ON reply.ID = com.PRINCIPAL_ID WHERE reply.ID = t1.`ID`)

getPSDELogicNodes.name: 讨论热度+5
getPSDELogicNodes.sql:
update discuss_post t1 set t1.heat = t1.heat + 5 
where t1.id = ?

getPSDELogicNodes.name: 讨论热度-2
getPSDELogicNodes.sql:
update discuss_post t1 set t1.heat = t1.heat - 2 
where t1.id = ?

getPSDELogicNodes.name: 计算此回复下的评论条数
getPSDELogicNodes.sql: select count(1) as comment_num from `comment` where principal_id = ? and principal_type = 'DISCUSS_REPLY'

getPSDELogicNodes.name: 热度降低
getPSDELogicNodes.sql:
update discuss_post t1 set t1.heat = t1.heat - ((2 * ?) + 5)  
where exists(select 1 from discuss_reply t2 where t1.id = t2.post_id and t2.id = ?)

getPSDELogicNodes.name: 删除回复下的评论数据
getPSDELogicNodes.sql: delete from `comment` where principal_id = ? and principal_type = 'DISCUSS_REPLY'

getPSDELogicNodes.name: 讨论热度+2
getPSDELogicNodes.sql:
update discuss_post t1 set t1.heat = t1.heat + 2 
where t1.id = ?
